title: API Endpoint Configuration
description: POST endpoint at /campaigns for creating new email campaigns with comprehensive validation schema.

title: Request Body Schema
description: Zod schema validation for campaign data including name, subject, template, target audience, and scheduling options.

title: Response Schema
description: Type-safe response schemas for both success (200) and error (400) responses with proper typing.

title: Campaign Object Creation
description: Creates campaign object with status logic, metrics initialization, and proper data structure.

title: Database Storage
description: Stores campaign in Appwrite database and retrieves generated ID and creation timestamp.

title: Workflow Trigger
description: Emits 'campaign-created' event to trigger the email automation workflow with campaign data.

title: Success Response
description: Returns campaign details including ID, name, status, creation time, and trace ID for tracking.
